name: Relink
description:
- Click on a data node then a direction to slide towards, or click it again to cancel.

 - Nodes shouldn't slide outside the grid.

 - Hitting a data vault turns it into a data node and pushes back whatever hits it by 1 tile. 

- Data nodes links with other adjacent nodes, linked nodes move together.

 - To solve, link all data nodes and have one node inside each green power cell.

Developed by Logix Indie & Big Cheese. It's not completed, but we are happy to make a functional game in time!
